title: Understanding the Destination Area
text: When copying a range of cells to a nonadjacent destination area, it's important to know where to start pasting the copied data.

title: Identifying the Top Cell
text: The top cell in the destination area is the first cell where the copied data will be pasted. It acts as the starting point for the paste operation.

title: Selecting the Correct Cell
text: Which cell should you select in the destination area to start pasting the copied data?
